summary: Silver Bulletin approve % trajectory: Nov 41.1-41.8%, Dec 42.8%, Jan 2 42%, Jan 24 ~41%, Feb 5 ~41.2% (net -13.7)
content:
Key data points for Silver Bulletin APPROVE column:
- Nov 25, 2025: ~41.1-41.8% (fine print: Nov 29 was 41.19%)
- Nov 27 Thanksgiving: 41.1% approve, 55.3% disapprove
- Dec 14, 2025: 42.8% approve, 54% disapprove
- Jan 2, 2026: 42% approve, 54% disapprove
- Jan 21: net -12.9 (approve ~41.5-42%)
- Jan 24-26: ~41% approve (from Silver Bulletin article: "41 percent of voters approve")
- Jan 29: net -14.6 (second term low area)
- Feb 1: net -14.3
- Feb 5: net -13.7 (slightly improving)
- Approve estimated ~41.0-41.3% on Feb 5

Range over 3 months: 40.5% to 42.8%. Recovery from late-Jan low partly driven by outlier polls (InsiderAdvantage +1). Strongly disapprove broke 46% for first time on Feb 5.
